problems.title: Permutations of String
problems.description:
Problem Statement
Given a string S containing distinct lowercase letters, print all possible permutations of the string in lexicographical order.

Input Format
Single string S

Output Format
Each permutation on a new line (lexicographically sorted)

Example
Input:
abc

Output:
abc
acb
bac
bca
cab
cba
problems.examples:
Sample Input
abc
Sample Output
abc
acb
bac
bca
cab
cba
problems.constraints:
1 ≤ |S| ≤ 9
All characters are distinct lowercase letters

testCases.expectedOutput:
abc
acb
bac
bca
cab
cba

hintsList: Fix one character at a time and recurse on remaining

problems.title: Print All Balanced Parentheses
problems.description:
Problem Statement
Given an integer N, print all possible ways to form N pairs of balanced parentheses.

Input Format
Single integer N

Output Format
Print each valid combination on a new line (any order)

Example
Input:
3

Output:
((()))
(()())
(())()
()(())
()()()
